articles.author: Michael Dorgan
articles.title: Couple claim eye antibiotic cured dog of mysterious illness sweeping America - Fox News
articles.description: A California couple are claiming their canine recovered from a potentially deadly disease after being treated with a lifesaving antibiotic.
articles.content: A cure to a mysterious and potentially deadly respiratory condition that has been spreading in dogs throughout the country may have been found with a California couple who claim their canine is on th… [+3380 chars]
